item.title: Treasury yields steady ahead of Fed decision
item.description: Yields on U.S. government debt moved slightly higher Wednesday morning as traders awaited a monetary policy update from the Federal Reserve.

item.title: European defense stocks dip from peaks after traders ‘buy the rumor, sell the fact’
item.description: There’s now looming uncertainty about how exactly new military spending will be allocated.

item.title: There are new fears about Fed firings after FTC dismissals. What analysts are saying.
item.description: An action taken late on Tuesday is again raising the question of Trump’s authority to dismiss Fed officials

item.title: Netflix paid $55 million for a show. Prosecutors say the creator blew it on Rolls Royces and crypto.
item.description: Netflix paid Carl Erik Rinsch top dollar during the peak streaming boom for a sci-fi series he never delivered, losing it all on bad investments and l...

item.title: General Mills sees slump in snack sales as customers focus on essentials
item.description: The company said that organic net sales “finished below our expectations.”
